name: One Kick Man - Team 10
description:
Description :

One kick Man is 3D top down beat them all developed during the September's Godfather/Mother Game Jam.

In this game, you have to kick all of your opponents through multiple levels to get your stolen shoes back ! Kick'em all !!

Gameplay:

Move through rooms with your keyboard (ZQSD or arrows) and kick enemies with a left click of your mouse. Find your precious shoes at Level 5

Team : 

Game Programming : SAUTEREAU Téo - DU David - MALKA Romain

Game Design : JELMONI Mathis - ESCOFFIER Thomas

Game Art: RASSON Lucas

Project Management :  DELOBEL Romain - DJOEHANA Argha
